title: Contentful - Activity Overview
description: This Dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and action events captured by the Contentful platform.

definition.content:
[Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/products/platform/) is a content (articles, photos, and videos) management platform that allows businesses to create, manage, and deliver digital content across various channels like websites and mobile apps through its intuitive interface and robust APIs or SDKs.

This Dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the content and action events captured by the Contentful platform.

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
